page.title: 18Recreation Breeding Dogs
page.content: When we visited the dairy farmer we also talked to his wife. We discovered that she bred dogs for showing at dog shows. We walked into her living room and there in the corner was a large, glass fronted cupboard full of cups, rosettes and certificates which her dogs had won for her. The type of dog is called Griffon Bruxellois which comes from Brussels. They weigh up to 4.5 Kg and are coloured red, black or black and tan. One year one of her dogs won the best of breed award at Crufts. She was very proud of her animals.
